title: Swiss on white: winter sports at St. Moritz
creator_credit: Phillip M. Brown and Central Films
brief_description: Cinemagazine style documentary on winter sports at St Moritz, Switzerland. Items include ice skating, ice hockey, horse racing on ice, trick skating, toboganning, skiing, snow marathon and ski jumping.
